title: Invert dependency between remoting and common module
description: It is usually understood that the common module is the fundamental dependency for other modules and should not depend on other modules in the project. But in RocketMQ common module depends on remoting module, which looks weird and is an obstacle to the expansion of remoting. So I want to invert the dependency between remoting and common module to make common module really common.
